reference.title: Yokomenuchi shihonage
reference.shortdesc: Four direction throw (shihonage) in response to strike to the side of the head (yokomenuchi).

section.p: May be performed omote or ura.
Omote: Uke strikes toward the near side of Nage's head.

image.alt: Yokomenuchi strike to the side of the head. Nage is beginning to raise his hands to block the strike as he steps off the line of attack to avoid the strike.
